attributes.action:
Stop the Government restricting/changing
Personal Independence Payments Awards.
attributes.additional_details:
Please support the petition to stop the Government restricting/changing Personal Independence Payments Awards for people who need support due to illness or disability. 
Stop the downgrading of points based on the need of Disability Aids for everyday activities & the new re-evaluation of points.
Which means Disabled People with true difficulties & provisional needs will be missed & could result in the loss of caregiver support/provision as they would no longer meet care component criteria.
attributes.background:
Stop the Government restricting/changing Personal Independence Payments Awards Criteria for people who need support due to Illness/Disability. 
Stop the downgrading of points because of the use of disability aids for everyday activities.
Stop the new re-evaluation of points .
